entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
